ComicInfo.Title: Safe Night; Protector; Mayhem of the Terror Jocks!; Prize Fighter with Susanoo the Brawler
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-12 08:36:27. [CVDB142014] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-18 11:59:31. [Issue ID 304897]
ComicInfo.Summary:
1-page epilogue to the first comic story in this issue, "Prize Fighter With Susanoo the Brawler" hints at more plot to continue in future stories.
Ev and Susan go to a carnival. The top prize at one booth is a 12-inch Virile Man action figure that Ev wants and that is sold out at stores. Susan tries to win it for him, but cannot knock down all the pins with the baseball. Susan complains the game is rigged, but then her sister comes along and knocks down the pins on her first throw.
